snippet: The headline-making aspect of Mr. Allen’s memoir is his depiction of the stormy relationship with Bill Gates as two business partners’ equivalent of a first bad marriage.

snippet: The video-games rating board plans to announce that the main evaluation of games will no longer be based on direct human judgment but on a detailed digital questionnaire designed to bestow an age-appropriate rating.
abstract: Seth Schiesel discusses the decision by the Entertainment Software Ratings Board to switch from human reviewers to a computer program, aided by detailed digital questionnaires completed by game developers, to rate offensive video-game content.

headline.main: Busy Job of Judging Video-Game Content to Be Ceded to Machines
headline.print_headline: Busy Job of Judging Video-Game Content to Be Ceded to Machines
